showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:23}); // Rufus
“Hmmm…
Good work everyone…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:26}); // Rufus
“I heard Sephiroth was on board.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:28}); // Rufus
“And it seems {Cloud}
and the others were on board, too.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:30}); // Rufus
“They all slipped through…
You messed up big this time, Heidegger.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:32}); // Rufus
“Is that all you can do?”{PAUSE}“Give one word answers
and apologize for everything?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:33}); // Rufus
“Do something.
I'll be expecting results.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:23}); // Rufus
“Hmmm…
Good work everyone…”

“I heard Sephiroth was on board.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:28}); // Rufus

and the others were on board, too.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:30}); // Rufus
“They all slipped through…
You messed up big this time, Heidegger.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:32}); // Rufus
“Is that all you can do?”{PAUSE}“Give one word answers
and apologize for everything?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:33}); // Rufus
“Do something.
I'll be expecting results.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:35}); // Rufus
“Very well then.
That was fast.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:37}); // Rufus
“Remember Heidegger,
Only one more mistake.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:24}); // Heidegger
“Gya, haa, haa!!
Hurry up with that!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:24}); // Heidegger
“Gya, haa, haa!!
Hurry up with that!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:31}); // Heidegger
“I'm ashamed of myself.”
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:2, adjust:0});
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:22}); // “Geez what a long boat ride!!”
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:22}); // “Geez what a long boat ride!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:36}); // “YES, SIR!!
Thank you, sir.”

dialogStrings: Costa del Sol harbor

{Barret}
“Damn!
Sure is hot here!”{PAUSE}“But I sure am glad
I can get rid of
that damn sailor suit.”{PAUSE}“Yo listen up!!
Make sure to mingle like
regular folks here!”

{Aeris}
“Oh, too bad.
I liked {Barret}'s sailor suit.
He looked so cute.”

{Barret}
“What'ya mean 'cute'?”

{Tifa}
“Right…well, uh…”{PAUSE}“{Barret}, why don't you use that
sailor suit for pajamas?”

“Right, {Cloud}?”
{CHOICE}Yeah, maybe…
{CHOICE}Concentrate on Sephiroth

{Cloud}
“Remember, this isn't a vacation.
We're here after Sephiroth.”{PAUSE}“I'm going on ahead.”

{Barret}
“Hmmph, {Cloud}. You're the one,
who's always hangin' around wastin' time.”{PAUSE}“I'm checkin' this place out!”

{Cloud}
“Ahhh…
You look like a bear wearing a marshmallow.”

{Barret}
“The hell's that supposed to mean!?
This happens to be more comfortable,
so shu'up!”

{Red XIII}
“…puff…puff…”{PAUSE}“Would you kindly hurry?
The heat here is drying my nose.”

{Yuffie}
“Yeah, mine, too!!”

{Cloud}
“All right.
We'll take a break and then head off.”{PAUSE}“Don't wander too far.”

{Barret}
“I'll wander wherever I damn well want!
Who made him the leader?”

{Red XIII}
“It looks like my mane got messed up.”{PAUSE}“I'm going to rest somewhere cool.”

{Tifa}
“I think I'll go swimming.”

{Aeris}
“Sounds good to me!”

{Aeris}
“Hmm? {Cloud},
are you thinking of anything in particular?”{PAUSE}“Your cool exterior's cracking…”

{Aeris}
“Well then, let's go!”

{Aeris}
“Maybe I should get a tan for a change?”{PAUSE}“Which do you like, {Cloud}?”
{CHOICE}I like fair complexions
{CHOICE}Maybe a healthy tan is nice

{Aeris}
“Got it. I'll remember that.”

{Yuffie}
“Don't bother looking for me!”
“Geez what a long boat ride!!”

Rufus
“Hmmm…
Good work everyone…”

Heidegger
“Gya, haa, haa!!
Hurry up with that!”
“Yes, sir!!”

Rufus
“I heard Sephiroth was on board.”

Heidegger
“…Yes.”

Rufus
“And it seems {Cloud}
and the others were on board, too.”

Heidegger
“…Yes.”

Rufus
“They all slipped through…
You messed up big this time, Heidegger.”

Heidegger
“I'm ashamed of myself.”

Rufus
“Is that all you can do?”{PAUSE}“Give one word answers
and apologize for everything?”

Rufus
“Do something.
I'll be expecting results.”
“Ready for departure, sir!!”

Rufus
“Very well then.
That was fast.”

“YES, SIR!!
Thank you, sir.”

Rufus
“Remember Heidegger,
Only one more mistake.”
“I'm the boss!”

“You'll never know what it's like
to toil away on the ship.”{PAUSE}“Sailing over the blue sea,
gazing up at a sky
that seems to drift on forever.
Feels like you're taking a
nap on birds wings.”{PAUSE}“It's the ultimate high!”

“Handsome…isn't he?”{PAUSE}“Don't worry, I'm not talking about you.”{PAUSE}“I'm talking about President Rufus.
Charming, rich, blond…
He even looks good in a suit.”

“Heh, heh…
I hear the Shinra brass are arriving soon.”{PAUSE}“Heh, heh…!
Got nothing to do with us, does it?”

“Hey!
Spread out, all of you, out!!”{PAUSE}“Any of you put a scratch or a dent
in that plane and I'll put one in your head!”{PAUSE}“Da plane, da plane!!
Here's something you'll probably
never get to do in your lifetime.”{PAUSE}“So let's just watch from here…
and wish.”

“Costa del Sol…a harbor paradise
where the sun always shines
and it's summer all year round!”{PAUSE}“Hmm…Things aren't going well…
You can go sightseeing in the city.”

“Stowaways, right?”{PAUSE}“It's okay.
I'm used to them.”{PAUSE}“The truth is, before I worked here,
I was one of the best.”

“Don't bug me.
This is Rufus's first official visit
since becoming President.”{PAUSE}“It seems like he's here
on business this time.”{PAUSE}“I'm so jealous of him, I could spit.
We're both about the same age,
but, he's President.”

“Oh crap…
The Shinra Manager won't come down.”{PAUSE}“Even though the President's here on business.
All he does is play,
forgetting everything to do with work.”

“Rufus complimented me on my job!”{PAUSE}“Wow!!
I guess it pays to do good work.”

“Damn.
I'm soaked down to my underwear.”{PAUSE}“Oops! You must be those AVALANCHE guys!”{PAUSE}“Quick! Let's get outta here!
Heidegger's in charge of the transport ship.”{PAUSE}“That's tough for both of us.”

“Ride the Shinra ship?
Yeah, sounds good
I couldn't steer it

“Oh…is that so?”{PAUSE}“Yep!
Actually, we do have an old junker
we're gonna get rid of,
And I was thinking about
going into the tourist business.”{PAUSE}“It's a little tougher than it looks
I better think this through…”

“Yeah.
It's too much for an amateur!”

Shinra Manager
“Oh, oh, oh!!!
I'm gonna quit this company!!”{PAUSE}“I mean it, I'm really gonna quit!!”

Shinra manager
“Heidegger's such an idiot!!”{PAUSE}“And Rufus, acting all big!!”

Shinra manager
“God, that sure felt good…”

“The transport ship won't be sailing
for quite awhile.
Heidegger's orders.”

“Think they're stowaways?
You'll be safe pretty soon.”

“It's 100 gil to Junon.
Give it to me,
and I'll put in a good word with the captain.”{PAUSE}“What'll we do?
{CHOICE}Pay up
{CHOICE}Don't do it

“Thank you. Come back any time
you want to stowaway on our ship.”

“Hey! No money?
And you wanna stowaway?
Don't make me laugh!”

“Okay.
Come on. This way.”

“It's not the most pleasant ride
but make the best of it.”

“After Rufus complimented him,
he strutted around awhile,
and haven't heard a peep from him since.”

“What a great day for a nap in the sun.
It always puts me in a good mood!”

“Hey, who're you?.
You look like
you've been around the world twice.”{PAUSE}“I don't know what your story is,
but hang in there.”

“Everyone's in a rush to get one last vacation in
before the Meteor strikes,
That's why it's so busy here.”

“There's no ship to Junon.
Recently, there's been a hoard on materials.
Everything's topsy-turvy.”

“Not gonna be able to nap like this
for much longer.”{PAUSE}“When you put it that way, I feel kind of sad.”

“Well, I'm not worried.
When it crashes down,
I'm heading for the skies.”{PAUSE}“The only problem is…
will there be anywhere
left to land?”
